description: Displays change over time and recalibration would be needed to return it to reference state for brightness and colours. With bundled Spyder4EXPRESS, including a colour colourimeter and software, so that the photographers and designers can work confidently on PA248QJ calibrated monitor and assert greater control over the colour fidelity of their digital process. Moreover, PA248QJ also provides an accessorized monitor hood to help reduce light reflection and glare from ambient lighting for optimized screen performance, enhanced colour calibration consistency and quality image making. The ASUS PA248QJ features a 16:10 aspect ratio, 1920 x 1200 A+ IPS LED-backlit panel for 100% sRGB and 72% NTSC colour reproduction; addititionally, along with a 178° wide viewing angle, it ensures quality visuals and minimal onscreen colour shift from almost any viewing position.
